nodes.text: The Olabria system was an Outer Rim Territories star system located within the Seitia sector. It was home to the Olabrian trichoid parasite.

The Olabria system was first mentioned in The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook, published in 1996 by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the system within grid square J-20.
